mapper.select: SELECT comment.id, comment.parent_id, comment.user_id, user.nickname, board.type_id, board_type.name as type, comment.board_id, board.title, comment.body, comment.is_anonymous, comment.created_at, comment.modified_at, comment.like_cnt, IFNULL(comment_like.comment_id, 0) FROM comment JOIN board ON board.id = comment.board_id JOIN user ON comment.user_id = user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN comment_like ON comment.id = comment_like.comment_id and comment_like.user_id = #{userId} join board_type on board.type_id = board_type.id WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND comment.state = 0 ORDER BY comment.created_at LIMIT #{params.recordSize} OFFSET #{params.offset}

SELECT comment.id, comment.parent_id, comment.user_id, user.nickname, board.type_id, board_type.name as type, comment.board_id, board.title, CASE WHEN ((#{userId} != #{targetUserId} AND comment.is_anonymous = 0) OR comment.user_id = #{userId}) THEN comment.body ELSE NULL END as body, comment.is_anonymous, comment.created_at, comment.modified_at, comment.like_cnt, IFNULL(comment_like.comment_id, 0) FROM comment Join board ON board.id = comment.board_id INNER JOIN user ON user.id = comment.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN comment_like ON comment.id = comment_like.comment_id and comment_like.user_id = #{targetUserId} join board_type on board.type_id = board_type.id WHERE ((#{userId} != #{targetUserId} AND comment.is_anonymous = 0) OR comment.user_id = #{userId}) AND comment.user_id = #{targetUserId} ORDER BY comment.created_at LIMIT #{params.recordSize} OFFSET #{params.offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(board_id, user_id, parent_id, body, created_at, is_anonymous) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{user_id}, #{parent_id}, #{body}, NOW(), #{is_anonymous})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET body = #{body}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
